author: cbs8
title: TreadWright Tires Launches a New Line of Environmental and Affordable Light Truck & SUV Tires
text:
TreadWright Tires
TreadWright's Manufacturing Process Uses 70% Recycled Materials, Saving Nearly 12 Gallons of Oil per Tire
HOUSTON , Sept. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- TreadWright Tires, a Houston based Light Truck & SUV tire remanufacturing company, has launched a new line of TreadWright branded Mud Terrain and All Terrain tires. These include 29 new sizes and load ranges that are now available at TreadWright.com and select retail tire stores.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150924/270573
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150924/270574LOGO
"TreadWright Tires is making a commitment to retail outlets and government agencies by offering the TreadWright brand on all new A/T and M/T tires. Resellers are looking for a quality brand that differentiates itself with customers and TreadWright delivers an environmental option at an affordable price without sacrificing performance," said Anthony Showen, CEO TreadWright Tires. "These new sizes will cover nearly 70% of the replacement tire market with 20-inch Mud Terrain sizes arriving this winter."
New TreadWright Branded All Terrain Sizes:
LT245/75R17 (E) – Warden II LT265/75R16 (E&D) - Warden LT265/70R17 (E&C) - Warden LT285/70R17 (E&D) - Warden LT285/75R16 (E&D) - Warden LT245/75R16 (E) - Warden LT215/85R16 (E) – Warden II LT235/85R16 (E) – Warden II LT235/80R17 (E) – Warden II LT225/75R16 (E) – Warden II New TreadWright Branded Mud Terrain Sizes:
LT35x12.5R17 (D) – Guard Dog LT315/70R17 (D) – Guard Dog LT315/75R16 (D) – Guard Dog LT31x10.5R15 (C) – Guard Dog LT265/75R16 (E&D) - Claw LT265/70R17 (E&C) - Claw LT285/70R17 (E&D) – Guard Dog LT285/75R16 (E&D) – Guard Dog LT265/70R16 (D&P) – Guard Dog LT285/65R18 (D) – Guard Dog About TreadWright Tires:
TreadWright Tires has been remanufacturing quality tires in the USA for over 30 years. Our mold cure production process uses 70% recycled materials and saves the environment nearly 12 gallons of oil per tire as well as keeping tires out of our nation's lakes and streams. TreadWright Tires offers aggressive on/off road A/T and M/T remolded tires at a cutting edge price point. Learn more about becoming an authorized distributor or purchasing direct by visiting us at TreadWright.com .
Marketing / Media Contact – Randy Koch , 281-908-9965 cell
